name: Looking forward to getting out of Atlanta. I'll be in LA, Vegas, and Maui over the next 6 weeks or so. I'm fairly certain that hell is cold, not hot.

content.html: Looking forward to getting out of Atlanta. I'll be in LA, Vegas, and Maui over the next 6 weeks or so. I'm fairly certain that hell is cold, not hot.
